none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 10, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
I'm just not really sure what more you could want this morning than.....than this. Fierce, brutal Finnish hardcore with buzzsaw guitars and a tinge of Burning Spirits in the vocals. Absolutely fucking relentless, and the perfect prequel to 2015's also perfect though slightly more advanced Kohti Lohdutonta Huomista. Karoline just walked by me and commented "Who's this? Sounds like a ripper." Listen to that woman, folks, she's a smart one. DEMO 15/12/2014
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2018/02/vastusta.html https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgeA4iEPCv73uQra-_jOCyzpB4zu4DhRPBXnATRW9JaDhaZ7m5QvW8ci1gSAbnoi5IQeJGrutUNm2K7XxdMgLLHYEMgmHrXPzIHJgsxtSPfAiUwxANvYya0CAKb8XckTqsSVRM4MqE8j7X8m7fWscIXCNfaczmuYL6QtDss_LGuI-lsCGeHS13FOTKVyg/s2111/Vastusta%20TE%20img.jpg

seo.title: Vastusta - Demo 15/12/2014 - Terminal Escape
